title.description: A short, evocative title for the scene (3-6 words)

hook.description: One sentence that captures the emotional core of this scene

narrative.description: A 2-3 sentence description of what happens in the scene, written as a mini story

visual_moments.description: Key visual moments or shots that would appear in the video

pet_behavior.description: The specific pet behavior or expression that anchors this scene

emotional_arc.description: How the emotion builds or shifts during the scene (e.g., 'anticipation → joy', 'calm → playful surprise')

setting.description: Where the scene takes place (be specific)
